official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to restrictions on changes in benefits under Medicare+Choice plans.
short_title: Medicare Managed Care Notification Act of 1999

summary.text: Medicare Managed Care Notification Act of 1999 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to: (1) prohibit a Medicare+Choice organization under Medicare part C (Medicare+Choice) from changing the terms of benefits in a manner adverse to an enrollee; and (2) require such an organization that intends to change its benefits from those previously offered to provide to enrollees 120-day advance notice in comparative form of the changes intended.

titles.title: Medicare Managed Care Notification Act of 1999
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to restrictions on changes in benefits under Medicare+Choice plans.
